ygData.subject: Re: Can anyone share befallen info
ygData.msgSnippet: The only bronze stuff worth buying is: Chest plate(dmg absorbtion) Leggings, arm and helm (for the look) Other parts better off using items that add to stats.
ygData.messageBody:
The only bronze stuff worth buying is:

Chest plate(dmg absorbtion)
Leggings, arm and helm (for the look)

Other parts better off using items that add to stats. The small increase in AC
is not worth the weight and money
